properties.name: Configuration
properties.description: This section describes properties used to configure the component.

properties.name: Component
properties.description: A base class for all components and UI components.

Methods.name: beginUpdate()
Methods.description: Postpones rendering that can negatively affect performance until the [endUpdate()].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#endUpdate') method is called.

Methods.name: endUpdate()
Methods.description: Refreshes the UI component after a call of the [beginUpdate()].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#beginUpdate') method.

Methods.name: instance()
Methods.description: Gets the UI component's instance. Use it to access other methods of the UI component.

Methods.name: off(eventName)
Methods.description: Detaches all event handlers from a single event.

Methods.name: off(eventName_eventHandler)
Methods.description: Detaches a particular event handler from a single event.

Methods.name: option(optionName)
Methods.description: Gets the value of a single property.

Methods.name: option(optionName_optionValue)
Methods.description: Updates the value of a single property.

Methods.name: option(options)
Methods.description: Updates the values of several properties.

Methods.name: resetOption(optionName)
Methods.description: Resets a property to its default value.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: disposing
Events.description: Raised before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: initialized
Events.description: Raised only once, after the UI component is initialized.

Events.name: optionChanged
Events.description: Raised after a UI component property is changed.
